name: Blazing Combo
effects: Physical fire damage (2.47x, ATK) to one enemy (ignore cover)
Reduce resistance to Fire by 30% for 3 turns to one enemy

desc_short: Deal partial unmitigated damage and reduce fire resistance to enemy.

desc_long: Deal partial unmitigated fire damage and reduce fire resistance to enemy.
對1名敵人發動無視防禦的攻擊並降低其火屬性耐性。

Fügt teilweise direkten Feuerschaden zu und reduziert Feuerresistenz, alle Ziele.
